name: ps3hax-width-fix
description:
It fixes the width of the new template for resolution of 1024x768.

Created by : StarMelter
additional_info:
Versions :
0.04 - fixed the footer position also tab text
0.03 - fixed the login

0.01 - fixed width of wrapper ,banner register and ps3/ps4 logo.
